name: Xtrem Soviet Builder
description:
Xtrem Soviet Builder is an arcade city builder in wich you have to build a great road for your motherland. But in order to complete this goal you will need to create a sustainable city to produce enough worker to replace those who die at the task.

How to play

the Goal is finish the great  trans-siberian road, you lose if your out of time or workers

  • Arrow to move
  • Z to wait
  • X to build
  • Built house give more worker
  •  Build factory give more money
  • Built town hall give more time
